jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: We are looking for a passionate Software Engineer to develop, test, and maintain web and mobile applications. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
requirements: Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, or C++
Experience with web development frameworks (e.g., React, Angular)
Strong understanding of software development principles and best practices
Experience with version control tools (e.g., Git)

jobs.title: Community Outreach Coordinator
jobs.description: We are looking for a passionate Community Outreach Coordinator to lead health awareness campaigns and engage local communities to promote public health initiatives.
requirements: Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Experience in community outreach or public health roles
Ability to develop and manage outreach programs
Fluency in Kiswahili and English

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: We are seeking a talented Data Scientist to analyze large datasets, build predictive models, and provide actionable insights that support data-driven decision-making.
requirements: Strong background in statistical analysis and machine learning
Proficiency in Python, R, and SQL
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment

jobs.title: Graphic Designer
jobs.description: We are seeking an experienced Graphic Designer to create visually compelling designs for marketing campaigns, websites, and branding.
requirements: Proficiency with Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign)
Strong creativity and visual design skills
Ability to manage multiple projects under tight deadlines
Experience in print and digital design

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description: We are looking for an experienced Project Manager to oversee projects from inception to completion. You will manage timelines, budgets, and cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality results.
requirements: Proven experience in project management
Strong organizational and leadership skills
Familiarity with project management tools (e.g., Asana, Trello, MS Project)
Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously

jobs.title: Sales Executive
jobs.description: We are seeking a dynamic Sales Executive to drive sales and revenue growth. You will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, maintaining relationships with clients, and achieving sales targets.
requirements: Proven track record in sales and business development
Excellent communication and negotiation skills
Ability to build strong relationships with clients
Self-motivated with a results-driven approach

jobs.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
jobs.description: We are looking for a skilled Cybersecurity Analyst to protect our digital assets by identifying vulnerabilities, analyzing threats, and implementing robust security measures.
requirements: Certifications in cybersecurity (e.g., CISSP, CISM)
Strong understanding of network security and threat intelligence
Experience with security tools like SIEM and IDS/IPS
Ability to analyze and respond to security incidents

jobs.title: Teacher (Primary School)
jobs.description: We are seeking a passionate Primary School Teacher to educate and inspire young minds. You will deliver lessons in a variety of subjects, fostering a positive learning environment.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Education or relevant field
Experience in teaching primary school-aged children
Strong communication and classroom management skills
Patience and ability to engage children effectively

jobs.title: Chef (Hotel & Restaurant)
jobs.description: We are seeking a talented Chef to create delicious dishes for our restaurant. You will be responsible for menu planning, food preparation, and maintaining high-quality standards.
requirements: Experience as a professional chef
Knowledge of food safety and kitchen management
Creativity in designing new recipes and menus
Ability to work in a high-pressure kitchen environment

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: We are seeking a talented Backend Developer to build robust server-side applications that power our web and mobile platforms. You will work closely with frontend developers and product teams.
requirements: Strong programming skills in languages like Python, Node.js, or Ruby on Rails
Experience with databases like PostgreSQL or MongoDB
Understanding of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
Experience with cloud services like AWS or Azure is a plus

jobs.title: Social Media Manager
jobs.description: We are looking for a creative Social Media Manager to drive brand awareness and engagement across various platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.
requirements: Experience managing social media accounts for brands or companies
Proficiency in content creation and community management
Strong writing and visual skills
Ability to track and analyze social media metrics

jobs.title: Customer Support Representative
jobs.description: We are seeking a friendly and professional Customer Support Representative to assist customers with inquiries, resolve issues, and ensure a positive customer experience.
requirements: Excellent communication and problem-solving skills
Experience in customer service or support roles
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
Strong attention to detail and empathy

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description: We are looking for an experienced Marketing Manager to develop and execute marketing strategies, manage campaigns, and oversee branding efforts across multiple platforms.
requirements: Master's degree in Marketing or related field
Strong leadership and communication skills
Experience in brand management, advertising, and market research
Ability to analyze market trends and customer data

jobs.title: Financial Analyst
jobs.description: We are seeking a skilled Financial Analyst to provide financial insights and support decision-making across the company, focusing on financial forecasting, budgeting, and variance analysis.
requirements: CFA or CA certification
Strong analytical and modeling skills
Experience with financial forecasting and budgeting
Proficiency in Excel and financial modeling tools

jobs.title: Operations Manager
jobs.description: We are looking for an experienced Operations Manager to optimize our business processes, manage supply chains, and oversee day-to-day operations to improve efficiency and productivity.
requirements: MBA or equivalent degree
Strong process improvement and problem-solving skills
Experience in supply chain management and logistics
Proven leadership skills and ability to manage cross-functional teams

jobs.title: HR Specialist
jobs.description: We are seeking a skilled HR Specialist to support recruitment, employee training, and HR operations. You will assist with improving HR processes and ensuring compliance with labor laws.
requirements: Degree in Human Resources or related field
Strong understanding of labor laws
Experience in recruitment and employee relations
Excellent organizational and interpersonal skills
